org.grouplens.lenskit.util.parallel

Class TaskGraphExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.util.parallel.TaskGraphExecutor

  • public abstract class TaskGraphExecutor
extends java.lang.Object

    Run tasks with (pre-computed) dependencies. Task graphs are represented by Grapht DAG nodes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TaskGraphExecutor()

      Create a task graph runner that uses Runtime.availableProcessors() threads.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static TaskGraphExecutor create(int nthreads,
                       java.lang.String name)

        Create a task graph runner that uses the specified number of threads.

        Parameters:
        nthreads - The number of threads (at least 1).
        name - The name of the task executor (used to name threads)
        Returns:
        A new task graph runner.

      • execute

        public abstract <T extends java.util.concurrent.Callable<?>,E> void execute(DAGNode<T,E> graph)
                      throws java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException,
                             java.lang.InterruptedException

        Execute a task graph.

        Parameters:
        graph - The graph to execute.
        T - The task type.
        E - The edge type.
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - If there is an error executing one or more tasks.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If task execution is interrupted.
